import React,{useState} from 'react'; import{Button} from './Button'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import './Navbar.css'; import Dropdown from './Dropdown'; function Navbar(){ const [click,setClick]= useState(false) const [dropdown ,setDropdown]= useState(false); const handleClick =() => setClick(!click) const closeMenu=()=> setClick(false); return( <>

) } export default Navbar;
